title: Magnifying Glass with 12 LED Lights 30X Handheld Magnifier with Thickened Magnifying Glass Lens for Macular Degeneration & Seniors Reading & Kids Science Observation
features: 30X High Magnification: it is mainly made up of an optical glass lens and a few plastic parts. Original ABS parts are friendly to environment & harmless to human. Thickened high quality glass lens will give you a clear image without distortion.
In-built 12 LED Lights: it has 12 bright LED lights which provide light when you read or work in a dark or low-light place.

3.15 Inches Effective Lens: the large lens brings you good experiences in reading and viewing books, newspapers,magazines, photographs, maps,pill bottles, instructions, electronics or more fine details in appreciating miniature, jewelry, antique, coins, oil painting, hobbies, models, and crafts, etc.
Easy to Use: once you open the packaging it is ready to use. If you want to use it in dark or low-light places, you just need to put 2 AA batteries (not included) in it.

Wonderful Gift for Elderly & Kids: for seniors in reading small text and finding more fine details; for kids and children in exploring nature or observing everything they are interested in. For poor vision people or professionals in their lives and works.
description: The glass lens is very clear, which is perfect for kids to observe anything in nature, for adults to check small thing, for seniors to read newspaper or magazine.
